title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 41 - Allocation Of Gross Earnings By Telephone And Telegraph Corporations From Transmission Services
content:

State Regulations
§ 41.1 - General
§ 41.2 - Allocation by accounting
§ 41.3 - Allocation by formula
§ 41.4 - Computation of the revenue-producing circuit miles factor
§ 41.5 - Computation of the property factor
§ 41.6 - Rented real property and tangible personal property

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 41

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 184, 186-a, 1096

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
